articles.author: Stefan Mackley
articles.title: German climate group take responsibility for Berlin Formula E protest - Motorsport.com
articles.description: The second Berlin E-Prix was able to take place without further incident following a short delay after protestors stormed the track ahead of the Formula E race.
articles.content:
The Tempelhof Airport Street Circuit in Germany was holding a double-header this weekend, which marked the halfway point in the championships 16-race calendar.
